text:
@realDonaldTrump Perhaps you'll be able to watch the economy rebound next year on TV night from your cell in Attica. 

PS...Instead of making ridiculous slo-mo campaign videos you could get back to not working on the COVID-19 response. In case you forgot, we still don't have adequate testing.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Rebound
entity.description: Sean Fletcher presents a game show that offers opportunities for contestants to win large cash prizes. Six players go up against one another in quick-fire question rounds. The quiz includes a mix of word puzzles, picture games and general knowledge questions. Inspired by the bleep test, there is also a giant moving `Rebound Bar' that sets the pace of the game. The contestants must attempt to give their answers before the bar approaches them, and the quicker they answer correctly, the more money they win.
